pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, February 27, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, February 27, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12 p.m.

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Budget Speech, to be delivered by the Minister of Finance, Bill Morneau, in the House of Commons.
